I added a kaplhite queen teleport.. and since i added that.. it dc laggs/ why i just addded a command.. no queen or nothing yet

item.title: Server dc/lagg
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Well, I’d check for packet corruption etc and if there’s enough resources. try

Speedtest.net

Speedtest by Ookla - The Global Broadband Speed Test

Test your Internet connection bandwidth to locations around the world with this interactive broadband speed test from Ookla

Then try looking for any processes which may be causing server lagg, example (I’m not to sure on PI) but if there’s a process which is un needed cluttering your process method. Then make sure it’s not a client - server issue. Be sure that the client isn’t crashing due to something in the server, if you notice a correlation between where there crashing then post it here.

It can be maps, Npcs etc…

Read full topic
